name: $::type
desc: Returns: Type of cost (copay; individual cap; family cap; coinsurance; deductible).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Type of cost (copay; individual cap; family cap; coinsurance; deductible).

name: $applicability
desc: Returns: Whether the cost applies to in-network or out-of-network providers (in-network; out-of-network; other).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Whether the cost applies to in-network or out-of-network providers (in-network; out-of-network; other).

name: $qualifiers
desc: Returns: Additional information about the cost, such as information about funding sources (e.g. HSA, HRA, FSA, RRA).

name: $addqualifiers
desc: Additional information about the cost, such as information about funding sources (e.g. HSA, HRA, FSA, RRA).

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Additional information about the cost, such as information about funding sources (e.g. HSA, HRA, FSA, RRA).

name: $value
desc: Returns: The actual cost value. (some of the costs may be represented as percentages rather than currency, e.g. 10% coinsurance).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The actual cost value. (some of the costs may be represented as percentages rather than currency, e.g. 10% coinsurance).
